title: Pregnancy + tracker
description:
Download the world’s leading pregnancy app today!
Pregnancy+ features expert advice, daily blog articles and interactive 3D models so you can track your baby’s development. Our pregnancy app has been downloaded over 30 million times by expecting families, so join our worldwide community of parents-to-be.
The pregnancy tracker app can be personalized so your partner, the future grandparents and your best friend can join in on the fun. With this app, they’ll be able to follow your baby’s development in the womb. Keep them up-to-date with your pregnancy by inviting them to download the app today.
This app features everything you need, including:
- Interactive 3D Models Showing Your Baby’s Development and Growth
- Baby Size Visualizer (Track Your Baby’s Size in Fruits, Animals and Sweets)
- Detailed Pregnancy Week by Week Guides Telling You What to Expect in Each Week of Pregnancy
- Daily Pregnancy Info
- Kick Counter
- Contraction Timer
- Pregnancy Weight Log
- Hospital Bag Tool to Help You Prepare for The Birth
- Customizable Birth Plan
- Pregnancy Calendar
- To-Do List
- 1000s Of Baby Names
- Pregnancy Due Date Calculator
- Baby Shopping List
- Pregnancy Diary to Keep Track of Your Prenatal Appointments
- Daily Blog Posts
If you’re pregnant and feeling overwhelmed by the amount of pregnancy advice out there, don’t worry. Download our pregnancy tracker app and let the Pregnancy+ app guide you through your pregnancy week by week. The app will keep you up-to-date with your baby’s development and help you stay healthy through pregnancy and beyond.
Upload photos of your growing bump to create a visual pregnancy diary to look back on. Search our baby name database for inspiration as you countdown to your baby’s arrival. Learn more about what exercises, foods and lifestyle changes are recommended for moms-to-be. Read tips on when to start your maternity leave, what to avoid when you’re expecting, and how to choose maternity clothes to flatter your pregnant body. Find all of this and more in the Pregnancy+ app today.
--------------------------------------------------
Privacy Policy: https://info.health-and-parenting.com/PrivacyNotice?locale=en&country=US
Terms of Use: https://info.health-and-parenting.com/TermsOfUse?locale=en&country=US
--------------------------------------------------
This app is not intended for medical use, or to replace the advice of a trained medical doctor. Philips Consumer Lifestyle B.V. disclaims any liability for the decisions you make based on this information, which is provided to you on a general information basis only and not as a substitute for personalized medical advice. If you have any concerns about your pregnancy, consult with your doctor or midwife.
The team at Pregnancy+ wishes you a healthy, full-term pregnancy and a safe delivery.
